defs.docs: Sets viewport with normalized coordinates and center as origin.

defs.docs: Returns the current program

defs.docs: Sets the current program only if the program is not in use.

defs.name: clear_program
defs.docs: Unset the current program.

defs.name: use_draw_state
defs.docs: Sets the current draw state, by detecting changes.

defs.name: clear_draw_state
defs.docs: Unsets the current draw state.

defs.docs: Setup that should be called at the start of a frame's draw call.

defs.name: draw_end
defs.docs: Finalize the frame's draw calls.

defs.name: draw
defs.value: fn <F, U> (&mut self, viewport: Viewport, f: F) -> U
defs.docs: Convenience for wrapping draw calls with the begin and end methods.

defs.name: has_texture_alpha
defs.docs: Assume all textures has alpha channel for now.

defs.name: Texture
defs.docs:
Wraps OpenGL texture data.
 The texture gets deleted when running out of scope.

defs.docs: Gets the OpenGL id of the texture.

defs.name: empty
defs.docs: Returns empty texture.

defs.docs: Loads image by relative file name to the asset root.

defs.docs: Creates a texture from image.
